favourite.article: Thank You Lord Jesus....
I stand up for Jesus when duty calls or danger, I will never be wanting there. Having done all to stand, I stand!
Thank You LORD.
Stand up stand up for Jesus we will not suffer loss As Christ said on the cross "It is finished" "Have you heard the Good news today?"
I have not heard this in a long time. Praise God I have now.
This song is awesome. As we stand up for Jesus in 2016, God who rules over the universe will surely bless us greatly now and forever.
I love You Jesus.
When you stand up for Jesus heavens stands with you...at attention when you mention that name. Hallelujah!
Our God is awesome.....Him alone can fight our battle.

This hymn is so inspiring... This night, my heart is swollen and in the middle of all night prayer, my pastor started singing this song, I now realise that God has given me victory. The quaking of heart is over forever in Jesus name.

The arm of flesh will fail us we dare not trust our own. Oh Lord help us to watch unto prayers. The strife will not be long. We will soon sing the victor"s song in Jesus Name Amen. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

The lyrics of this hymn are so inspiring, so is the tune. I especially love verse 3 where it says..."the arm of flesh will fail you"...this is absolutely true. If we stood up for Jesus though we may die, but we live eternal.

I woke up with this song in my spirit this morning. What a song, so inspiring and ever relevant. The wordings therein we need to obey, bearing in mind that if you stand for JESUS you will not fall. Stay blessed.
So inspiring!
I completely love this song ðŸŽ¶ the words are so powerful
When you stand up for Jesus, you just don't stand alone, the host of heaven stand with you. Thank God for the composer of this song.
Wooow. This is the song of the year in our church and it blesses me...
i am very much pleased to learn that I can get these precious song here. God bless and visit you in a very mighty way.

Thank you so much for making these old hymns available to the public. God bless you and reward you. It never ceases to amaze me what God uses these old hymns to do in my life. This particular one I was singing in my sleep 2 days ago. I know that the Lord is assuring me of victory in the midst of foes. All I have to do is pick up my God given weapons and fight to enforce the victory already won for me by Christ Jesus. Glory be to His name! All my enemies are under my feet in Jesus name. Amen! Alleluia!
Stand UP ! What an inspiration!!

Jesus is Lord indeed, Who can fight with the Lord, I say nobody. He has given us victory. Let us arise and declare His victory over every force of darkness. The weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strongholds. Praise the Lord.
Wow wow... my heart gets settled, it's such an inspiring hymn.
Every time I sing this hymn I just charged up to stand for Jesus and serve Him more and more. It always gives more strength to move on in the journey set before me.
This song will continue to be ever green for me, it spurs me on to have faith in this my God.
It's a song of conflict and victory. Spiritual war song to overcome your enemies in time of trouble. To God be the Glory!
Reminds me of the school days in the early 1980s in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe. It's is inspiring even now. To GOD be the glory!
This is the Christian Chorus. Our matching song.

Stand up! stand up for Jesus! Stand in His strength alone; The arm of flesh will fail you; Ye dare not trust your own. Put on the Gospel armor, And, watching unto prayer, Where duty calls, or danger, Be never wanting there
This a song of the Spirit. So inspiring. Hallelujah!
Makes me remember good old school days.
